intent_descriptions.course_info: Questions about specific courses, course content, course requirements, or course details
intent_descriptions.registration: Questions about course registration, enrollment, application process, or registration deadlines
intent_descriptions.academic_schedule: Questions about academic calendar, semester dates, class schedules, or timetable
intent_descriptions.staff_contact: Questions about contacting staff members, faculty, professors, or getting contact information
intent_descriptions.facility_info: Questions about campus facilities, laboratories, buildings, or equipment
intent_descriptions.program_info: Questions about academic programs, degrees, requirements, program details, academic handbook, or student handbook
intent_descriptions.general_query: General questions, greetings, or unclear queries that don't fit other categories
intent_descriptions.admission: Questions about admission requirements, entry criteria, or application process
intent_descriptions.fees: Questions about tuition fees, payment schedules, fee structure, or financial costs
